rules_text:
[i]Growing Power[/i] – Seliph & Julius get +1/+0 for each other creature you control with base power 2 or less.
[i]Overwhelming Manifestation[/i] – Whenever another creature dies, exile it with an manifestation counter. If a creature card in exile with a manifestation counter has flying, Seliph & Julius have flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, trample and vigilance.
